Name: G채nseliesel op. 170
Notes: The fairy tale 'G채nseliesel' contains several motifs that can also be found in the Grimm fairy tales 'Hansel and Gretel', 'Little Red Riding Hood' and 'The Frog Prince'. The music contains singing solo pieces, duets and trios, as well as a leitmotif recurring miniatures for the characterization of various speaking roles.
Long Description: The fairy tale 'G채nseliesel' (Goose Girl or Goose Lizzy) contains several motifs that can also be found in the Grimm fairy tales 'Hansel and Gretel', 'Little Red Riding Hood' and 'The Frog Prince'. The music contains singing solo pieces, duets and trios, as well as a leitmotif recurring miniatures for the characterization of various speaking roles. All music parts are short and in its stylistic diversity fancy and entertaining.
Short Description: A fairy tale play by Luise Greger, based on a text by Emilie Riedel, featuring motifs from Grimm fairy tales.
